text: tumhaaren maal aur tumhaare praan mein tumhaaree pareeksha hokar rahegee aur tumhen un logon se jinhen tumase pahale kitaab pradaan kee gaee thee aur un logon se jinhonne shirk kiya, bahut-see kashtaprad baaten sunanee padegee. parantu yadi tum jamen rahe aur (allaah ka) dar rakha, to yah un karmon mein se hai jo aavashyak thahara diya gaya hai
